summary.span: 提供 控件的控件数组。

span.span: Provides a control array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ButtonArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`CommandButton`数组。The `ButtonArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `CommandButton` array. 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在单击 中的 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件传递到其事件处理程序。The `Click` event passes an to its event handler. 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是，如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和控件的事件`Click`和时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a control, the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件时，控件不支持事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键和事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the and events. 使用属性示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改的常见击键的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不使控件能够接收键盘事件，中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当焦点在控件上释放键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is released and the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyUp` 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不使控件能够接收键盘事件，中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于形状通常单击鼠标按钮会导致以下一系列的控件中的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` `MouseClick` 两次单击关闭发生的时间非常具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成而不是第二个事件`MouseClick`事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过属性。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. `MouseHover`定义和检测到门户中的事件和属性。The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: `MouseHover` / / 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果属性设置为`false`、和`Validated`事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
